attributes.action: think again with regards to the proposal to allow TNT to acquire a stake in Royal Mail.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Royal Mail is not for sale; be it on a minority shares basis or complete privatisation. History shows that privatisation in whatever form leads to increased prices for the customer and reduced/scaled-back services. We want Royal Mail to become profitable within the public sector, wholly-owned by the Government. Without the need for TNT. What can TNT do that Royal Mail cant? The answer is nothing and this excercise will only serve to strip out valuable public assets. Let us all gain from a healthy, profitable, 100% Government-Owned Royal Mail.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
